nodes.text: Blumfruit was a fruit used in the preparation of blumfruit muffins, such as were popular at the Jedi Temple. A delicacy to the Ewoks, this large, red, egg-shaped berry grew of the forest moon of Endor. It was also used in the creation of blumfruit coolers, and could be added to a contemporary dessert known as Bama bars. As a child, Vima Sunrider drank juice made from blumfruits, which she tended to get all over her face and clothing.
